lists.title: Empty Ice and discard of old fruit
lists.body: Empty cubed and crushed ice. Place any old fruit in the bin. If the fruit is still okay, take to celler, clingfilm and place in the disignated area.

lists.title: Wipe fridges
lists.body: Spray the fridges and thoroughly wipe the seals, glass, handles and edges of the fridge door. Clean the bottom of the fridges if neccessery.

lists.title: Stock the fridges
lists.body: Restock all fridges including the soft drinks, bottled beers and wine

lists.title: Remove and clean beer nozzles
lists.body: Remove and place beer nozzles in water, soak for a few minutes then remove and dry. Place the nozzles back on and put nozzle covers on.
